Reviews.Title: Good gift to give
Reviews.Author: Don Locke
Reviews.Content: Was given as a  Christmas gift and was well received. Person given too uses this daily and can not believe picture quality and what all the extras can to for improve quality of pictures.

ProductInfo.Features:
14x Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens and comfortable grip
Lens-shift VR image stabilization
18.1 megapixel BSI CMOS image sensor
Large, high resolution 3.0-inch display
Full HD (1080p) video in stereo
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L620 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 14x Zoom Lens and Full 1080p HD Video (Black) + 32GB Memory Card + Focus Memory Card Reader + Vivitar Small Camera Case + Kit
